languages.text: "Ваше упорство и настойчивость, Гордей, заслуживали куда лучшего применения. Однако то, что, завершив это странствие, вы предались пороку праздности, заслуживает еще большего порицания, чем странный выбор жизненных целей".

"Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."
languages.original_text: "Ваше упорство и настойчивость, Гордей, заслуживали куда лучшего применения. Однако то, что, завершив это странствие, вы предались пороку праздности, заслуживает еще большего порицания, чем странный выбор жизненных целей".

traits.locale_text: "Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."

"Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."

languages.text: 「マスター・スカトフ、あなたの忍耐強さはどこか別の場所で使ってしまったようですな。ですが、あなたの人生の目標についての疑いの余地ある選択よりも、旅の後に怠惰に屈したという事実の方が、よほど責めるに値する」
languages.original_text: "Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・スカトフ、あなたの忍耐強さはどこか別の場所で使ってしまったようですな。ですが、あなたの人生の目標についての疑いの余地ある選択よりも、旅の後に怠惰に屈したという事実の方が、よほど責めるに値する」

languages.text: « Maître Skatov, votre persévérance aurait été plus utile ailleurs. Cela dit, ce n'est pas tant votre rêve, si discutable soit-il, qui mérite des reproches, mais plutôt l'indolence dans laquelle vous vous êtes enfoncé. »
languages.original_text: "Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Skatov, votre persévérance aurait été plus utile ailleurs. Cela dit, ce n'est pas tant votre rêve, si discutable soit-il, qui mérite des reproches, mais plutôt l'indolence dans laquelle vous vous êtes enfoncé. »

languages.text: “斯卡托夫大师，你的毅力本该用在其他的地方。不过，比起选择了错误的人生目标，你在旅途结束之后的怠惰生活，才更应当受到谴责。”
languages.original_text: "Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."

traits.locale_text: “斯卡托夫大师，你的毅力本该用在其他的地方。不过，比起选择了错误的人生目标，你在旅途结束之后的怠惰生活，才更应当受到谴责。”

languages.text: "Eure Beharrlichkeit, Meister Skatov, hätte an anderer Stelle genutzt werden sollen. Doch der Umstand, dass Ihr nach Eurer Reise der Trägheit erlegen seid, ist deutlich tadelnswerter als Eure fragwürdige Wahl von Lebenszielen."
languages.original_text: "Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Beharrlichkeit, Meister Skatov, hätte an anderer Stelle genutzt werden sollen. Doch der Umstand, dass Ihr nach Eurer Reise der Trägheit erlegen seid, ist deutlich tadelnswerter als Eure fragwürdige Wahl von Lebenszielen."

languages.text: «Maestro Skatov, debería haber dedicado su perseverancia a otras empresas. De todas formas, es más digno de reproche el hecho de que sucumbiera a la indolencia tras su viaje que sus cuestionables metas vitales».
languages.original_text: "Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."

traits.locale_text: «Maestro Skatov, debería haber dedicado su perseverancia a otras empresas. De todas formas, es más digno de reproche el hecho de que sucumbiera a la indolencia tras su viaje que sus cuestionables metas vitales».

languages.text: "Keşke bu azmini başka bir alanda gösterseymişsin Üstat Skatov. Yalnız asıl yüzünü karartan; hayattaki talihsiz gaye seçiminden öte, seyahatinin sona ermesinden sonra miskinliğe yenik düşmen olmuş."
languages.original_text: "Your perseverance, Master Skatov, should have been applied elsewhere. However, the fact that you succumbed to indolence after your journey is far more deserving of reproach than your questionable choice of life goals."

traits.locale_text: "Keşke bu azmini başka bir alanda gösterseymişsin Üstat Skatov. Yine de bu hayatta gaye seçiminin tartışmaya açık olmasından da öte, seyahatinin sona ermesinden sonra miskinliğe yenik düşmen, aslında çok daha büyük bir yüz karası olmuş."
